name: AnchorPosition
shortdesc: The point around which to transform the object.

property.name: TOPLEFT
property.shortdesc: The top left corner of the object.

property.name: TOPCENTER
property.shortdesc: The middle point on the top of the object.

property.name: TOPRIGHT
property.shortdesc: The top right corner of the object.

property.name: MIDDLELEFT
property.shortdesc: The middle point on the left side of the object.

property.name: MIDDLERIGHT
property.shortdesc: The middle point on the right side of the object.

property.name: BOTTOMLEFT
property.shortdesc: The bottom left corner of the object.

property.name: BOTTOMCENTER
property.shortdesc: The middle point of the bottom of the object.

property.name: BOTTOMRIGHT
property.shortdesc: The bottom right corner of the object.
